title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements. Gather data sources and understand well log data format. Identify stakeholders and establish communication channels.

title: Data Preparation and Exploration
description: Preprocess well log data, handle missing values, and perform exploratory data analysis. Understand data distribution and identify potential issues.

title: Model Selection and Development
description: Research and select appropriate machine learning models for facies classification. Develop and train the models using the preprocessed well log data.

title: Model Evaluation and Validation
description: Evaluate the performance of the trained models using appropriate metrics. Validate the models against test data and domain experts.

title: User Interface Design
description: Design a user-friendly interface for geologists and domain experts to interact with the facies classification model.

title: Backend Integration
description: Integrate the trained machine learning model with the backend system. Develop APIs and data pipelines for model deployment.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure data privacy and security measures are in place. Comply with relevant industry regulations and standards.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test cases for the facies classification system. Perform integration, system, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and Monitoring
description: Deploy the facies classification system to a production environment. Set up monitoring and logging mechanisms for system health and performance.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Develop user manuals, technical documentation, and training materials for geologists and domain experts.
